name: Splash Bash
description:
• Use your water gun to propel yourself through the air and bash the opponents!
  • Grab the Beach Ball power up to get unlimited water for a short time!
  • Random Accessories. Over 3000 combos!
  • Fast paced gameplay and easy to pick up controls brings you hours of mindless fun!
  • Over 20 levels!

DESIGNED FOR CONTROLLERS
Limited support for Mouse and Singleplayer against AI.
